General.Name: Mono Next Public Company Limited
General.Description: Mono Next Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the media and content business primarily in Thailand. The company produces and distributes entertainment content, general books, and motion pictures, as well as provides design and implementation services for online business. It also offers online and home shopping agency, subscribed streaming video, and location services; and engages in broadcasting and television, and commerce and content arrangement businesses. In addition, the company produces TV and other programming. Mono Next Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Pak Kret, Thailand.
General.Address: 29/9 Moo 4, Chaiyaphruek Road, Pak Kret, Thailand, 11120
